jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Execute monthly reporting for key employer branding social media assets, contents, and recruitment metrics
  • Analyze, evaluate, and produce reports of employer branding campaigns
  • Work with relevant stakeholders from recruiting to marketing and content production team to suggest and drive improvements on current reporting metrics
  • Conduct analysis to drive recommendations around the types of content/channels to focus on
  • Drive proposals and execution of ad-hoc projects around improving existing analytical dashboards and channel optimization
  • Develop media plans for employer branding campaigns across social media assets

• 1-2 years working as an analyst (preferably Marketing Analyst)
  • A big picture person with an eye for detail/process - able to grasp higher level organizational objectives but understands how individual metrics and date points fit into wider goals
  • Strong command of Excel and proficiency in solving quantitative/analytical problems
  • Strong interpersonal skills, demonstrated a proven track record of working in a team-based settings
  • Ability to drive projects with limited direction in a fast-paced and dynamic environment
  • Familiarity in digital marketing is a plus
  • Interest in social media marketing and content marketing is a plus
  • Experience in project management is a plus
